SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

edu.bath.transitivityutils
Interface Navigator<E>

Type Parameters:
E - the type of this navigator's objects
public interface Navigator<E>

A set of elements for which it can be asked which other elements are related to them. Another way to view this is that domain() returns the nodes of a graph, while related(Object) returns all nodes that are connected from a specified node with a directed edge.

See Also:
Navigators

Method Summary
 Set<E> domain()
          The domain of this navigator (all objects that are valid arguments to the related(Object) method).
 Set<E> related(E object)
          The set of objects that are related to the specified subject.
 

Method Detail

related

Set<E> related(E object)
The set of objects that are related to the specified subject. The specified object must exist in the domain() of this navigator.

domain

Set<E> domain()
The domain of this navigator (all objects that are valid arguments to the related(Object) method).
